titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for proroguing the Parliament until Tuesday the thirteenth of April next
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall this twenty third day of September, 1674, and in the twenty sixth year of our reign."
Reproduction of the original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
